definition.name: Add To GitHub projects
definition.description: Automatically add issues and PRs to GitHub projects
definition.author: GitHub

inputs.name: project-url
inputs.description: URL of the project to add issues to

inputs.name: github-token
inputs.description: A GitHub personal access token with write access to the project

inputs.name: labeled
inputs.description: A comma-separated list of labels to use as a filter for issue to be added

inputs.name: label-operator
inputs.description: The behavior of the labels filter, AND to match all labels, OR to match any label, NOT to exclude any listed label (default is OR)

outputs.name: itemId
outputs.description: The ID of the item that was added to the project
